quote: Life is not about what will happen after 100 years , life is about what will happen now that will make living worthwhile  for  100 years .
A good idea is not something which can hold true with its prediction for being true in the future , it's about it's creativity that will make it true .
Winning in real life is same as winning over a humiliation in your own mind!
Dreams never come  to you when you are waiting for them , nor do they occur to you shouting , they whisper in your ear when you are in a trans !
If you give legs to your fear , it will run away with your dreams .
Humiliation will bring tears to you extrinsically , yet will toughen you intrinsically .
Wisdom is not measured by age , but by the mental  sufferings one has survived , irrespective of the magnitude of each .
They say dream cannot equate to reality ,I bet they are not considering mankind !
A perception about a person  based on shallow  awareness is always right in all the wrong ways !
Introverts fuel their wisdom by remaining silent unlike others who diminish their wisdom growth by deriding  the former .
Being resourceful is better than expecting all the resources !
Silence and shyness indicate a true sense for protection of vigilant ideas.
Hope is superior of faith , it's how you keep going even if you fail versus stop and wait for the good.
Waves will always be fast , you have to take support of the wind to get through .
Opportunity will come to you everyday , every second ,only you won't be ready to sniff it!
Start being thankful of the unanswered prayers made to God!
The one moment when you feel you are better than the universe itself .
You just know me as you know atoms, There is plenty of void space you don 't know about.
You know me as a single person , but I am thousand personalities myself .
Question everything, even the answers need questions to exist!
Power is not something esoteric and envisaged by few , it's as universal as common sense is .
Ego is something which arises from self-underestimation.
